name: Raccoon Knight
description:
To Start:

Select difficulty then Click Start.

LEFT CLICK to advance cutscenes and dialogue.

In Walking Around Mode:

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.

When the sidebar appears, you can CLICK on the buttons for different actions.

In Battle Mode:

LEFT CLICK to ATTACK.

Hold RIGHT CLICK to BLOCK.

You can evade using:

Press A(Left) to DODGE LEFT.

D(Right) to DODGE RIGHT.

S(Down) to PARRY.

W(Up) to JUMP.

Evading requires good timing and the correct evade for specific enemy attacks.

The game can be completed without evading if you choose easy difficulty and block every attack.
